content:
Sure, here are some more recommendations for unique shops and boutiques in Hammersmith and nearby areas:

1. Havelock Studio: This boutique offers handmade ceramics, stationery, and homewares made by independent designers. 2. NOMAD Books: This independent bookshop offers a curated selection of books, including indie publishers and niche genres. 3. Marchpane: This bakery offers artisanal cakes, pastries, and baked goods made with locally sourced ingredients. They also cater to dietary restrictions. 4. GK Gallery & Tea Room: This boutique/gallery/tea room offers a unique blend of art, vintage furniture, and locally sourced teas and snacks. 5. Wyndham House Butchers: This family-owned butcher shop specializes in high-quality meat and game, and many products are sourced from local farms. I hope you find these recommendations helpful!
